# Aavegotchi Wiki (wiki.aavegotchi.com)

This repository powers the public Aavegotchi Wiki: https://wiki.aavegotchi.com

## Key change: Migration to Base (2025-07-25)

On 2025-07-25, Aavegotchi's canonical home migrated from Polygon to Base.
Polygon-era contracts are frozen/view-only for most actions; Polygon-era pages are primarily historical context.

## Canonical pages (Base-era)

- Migration to Base (2025): https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/base-migration
- Contracts (addresses; Base first): https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/contracts
- Bridges (Base + legacy Polygon context): https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/bridge
- Directory (index of pages): https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/directory
- Glossary: https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/glossary

## Guidance for citations

- Prefer Base-era sections and Base addresses when answering "current" questions.
- If a page is explicitly marked legacy/historical (Polygon era), treat it as archival unless the question is historical.

## Full index

Sitemap: https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/sitemap.xml
